issue.title: [Developer] Support * wildcards with "crossbow submit" via GitHub actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While the "group" feature can be useful, sometimes there is a group of builds that do not fit neatly into a particular group
